name: Xtratuf Topwater Slip-On Deck Shoes - Women's
description: With their slip-on design and clean lines, it would be easy to think the Topwater are just another maritime themed sneaker, but Xtratuf made sure they perform on land and at sea.TUF fabric uppers are cut and slash resistant, helping keep your feet safe from on hazards on deck.Slightly wider commercial grade fit.Non-marking outsole.SRC-rated outsole offers the best slip resistance available.
